info.title: BobaBoard's API documentation.
info.description:
# Intro
Welcome to the BobaBoard's backend API. This is still a WIP.

# Example Section
This is just to test that sections work. It will be written better later.

tags.name: todo
tags.description: APIs whose documentation still needs work.

tags.name: models
tags.description:
## Contribution
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/Contribution" />

## Tags
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/Tags" />

## Comment
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/Comment" />

## Board Summary (logged in)
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/LoggedInBoardSummary" />

## Descriptions
<SchemaDefinition schemaRef="#/components/schemas/Description" />

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The external id of the board to retrieve metadata for.

locked.summary: A board for logged in users only

401.description: User was not found and board requires authentication.

example.message: User must be authenticated to access board.

403.description: User is not authorized to fetch the metadata of this board.

example.message: User does not have required permission to access board.

post.description: Creates a new thread in the specified board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The id for the board in which the thread will be created.

goreboardExternalId.summary: The id for the gore board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The external id of the board to update metadata for.

403.description: User is not authorized to update the metadata of this board.

post.summary: Sets last visited time for board

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The external id of the board to mark as visited.

example.message: This board is unavailable to logged out users.

post.description: Mutes the specified board for the current user.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The external id of the board to mute.

delete.description: Unmutes the specified board for the current user.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The name of the board to unmute.

post.description: Pins the specified board for the current user.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The name of the board to pin.

delete.description: Unpins the specified board for the current user.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The name of the board to unpin.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The external id of the board to dismiss notifications for.

get.summary: Fetches latest roles summary for the board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The id of the board.

500.description: There was an error fetching board roles.

get.summary: Get latest activity on entire realm

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The external id of the realm to fetch the activity of.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to start feeding the activity of the board from.

get.summary: Get the feed for the given boards' activity.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The id of the board to fetch the activity of.

gore.summary: The feed for the gore board.

cursor.summary: The feed for a board with a cursor (!long).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to start feeding the activity of the board from.

gore.summary: The feed for the gore board.

cursor.summary: The feed for a board with a cursor.

parameters.name: categoryFilter
parameters.description: A category to filter the feed by.

get.summary: Get the feed for the current user activity activity.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to start feeding the activity of the user star feed from.

post.summary: Replies to a contribution with another contribution.
post.description: Posts a contribution replying to the one with id {postId}.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: The uuid of the contribution to reply to.

requestBody.description: The details of the contribution to post.

contribution.description: Finalized details of the contributions just posted.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

patch.description: Edits a contribution (for now just its tags).

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: The uuid of the contribution to edit.

requestBody.description: The details of the contribution to edit.

contribution.description: Finalized details of the contributions just edited.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

post.summary: Add comments to a contribution, optionally nested under another comment.
post.description: Creates a comment nested under the contribution with id {post_id}.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: The uuid of the contribution to reply to.

requestBody.description: The details of the comment to post.

comments.description: Finalized details of the comments just posted.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

get.summary: Fetches the top-level realm metadata by slug.

parameters.name: realm_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the realm.

get.summary: Fetches latest activity summary for the realm.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

get.summary: Gets notifications data for the current user.
get.description:
Gets notifications data for the current user, including pinned boards.
If `realm_id` is present, also fetch notification data for the current realm.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

get.summary: List all pending invites for the realm
get.description: See https://github.com/BobaBoard/boba-backend/issues/56 for future design intentions to return all invites.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

200.description: The metadata of all pending invites for the current realm.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

get.summary: Get an invite's realm and status.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The invite code.

200.description: The realm amd status of the requested invite.

404.description: The invite with the given code was not found.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The invite code.

requestBody.description: The user data for the invite. Only required if the user does not already have an account.

400.description: Request does not contain email and password require to create new user account.

403.description: The invite is not valid anymore, or the user's email does not correspond to the invited one.

404.description: The invite with the given code was not found, or the requested realm does not exist.

409.description: The user is already a member of the requested realm.

get.summary: Fetches latest roles summary for the realm.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

500.description: There was an error fetching realm roles.

get.summary: Gets data for the given subscription. Currently returns only the last update.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The external id of the subscription.

get.description: Fetches data for the specified thread.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to fetch.

withcommentsthread.summary: A thread with a comments thread.

401.description: User was not found and thread requires authentication.

patch.description: Updates the default view that the thread uses or the parent board of the thread.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread whose properties should be updated.

updateView.summary: A thread from the gore board.

moveThread.summary: A thread from the gore board.

defaultView.description: The default view that the thread should use.

parentBoardId.description: The id of the board that the thread should be moved to.

post.description: Mutes the specified thread for the current user.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to mute.

gorethreadExternalId.summary: A thread from the gore board.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to unmute.

gorethreadExternalId.summary: A thread from the gore board.

post.description: Hides the specified thread for the current user.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to unhide.

gorethreadExternalId.summary: A thread from the gore board.

delete.description: Unhides the specified thread for the current user.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to unhide.

gorethreadExternalId.summary: A thread from the gore board.

post.summary: Records a visit to a thread by the current user.
post.description: Records a visit to a thread by the current user.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread that is being visited.

gorethreadExternalId.summary: A thread from the gore board.

200.description: Thread has been marked as visited.

post.description: Adds selected thread to current user Star Feed.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to star.

204.description: Thread added to Star Feed successfully.

delete.description: Deletes selected thread from current user Star Feed.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The id of the thread to fetch.

204.description: Thread removed from Star Feed successfully.

get.summary: Gets data for the current user.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

patch.summary: Update data for the current user.

avatarUrl.description: The avatar url of the user.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

get.summary: Gets pinned boards for the current user on the current realm.

parameters.name: realm_id
parameters.description: The id of the realm.

pinned_boards.description: A map from board id to its LoggedInSummary for each pinned board.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

403.description: User is not authorized to perform the action.

get.summary: Gets bobadex data for the current user.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

get.summary: Gets settings data for the current user.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

patch.summary: Updates settings data for the current user.

401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

identities_count.description: How many identities are in this season. Note that just the array of identities isn't enough, cause it doesn't tell us how many identities are in total in the BobaDex season.

secret_identity.description: The public-facing identity associated with the comment.

user_identity.description: The identity of the original poster, if visible to the requester.

secret_identity.description: The public-facing identity associated with the contribution.

user_identity.description: The identity of the original poster, if visible to the requester.

next.description: Pagination link pointing to the next page.

accessory_id.description: The accessory to associate with the attached entity.

identity_id.description: The identity to associate with the attached entity, if fixed.

has_updates.description: Whether the board has a notification.

is_outdated.description: Whether the board's notifications are older than the user's last visit.

last_activity_at.description: When the board was last updated.

last_activity_from_others_at.description: When the board was last updated by someone other than the current user.

last_visited_at.description: When the board was last visited by the current user.

realm_boards.description:
A map from board id to its NotificationStatus for each realm board.
If `realm_id` is not present in the params, it will be empty.

pinned_boards.description: A map from board id to its NotiicationStatus for each pinned board.

RealmSettings.description: Cosmetic settings active for the Realm, merged with users' own preferences.

blocks.description: List of UI Blocks that appear in the Realm homepage.

boards.description:
The activity summary for each board in the realm. |
Keys are the uuid of each board.

Tags.description: Types of tags associated to a contribution.

starter.description: The contribution that starts the thread.

new.description: Whether the thread is new. False when the user is logged out.

muted.description: Whether the thread is muted. False when the user is logged out.

hidden.description: Whether the thread is hidden. False when the user is logged out.

comments.description: A map from post_id to its comments.

content.description: The content of the first post in the thread.

defaultView.description: The default view that the thread will display as.

identityId.description: The identity the original poster will use to create the thread.

accessoryId.description: The accessory that the original poster will use in the thread.

whisper_tags.description: The whisper tags associated with the thread.

index_tags.description: The searchable tags associated with the thread.

content_warnings.description: The content warnings associated with the thread.

category_tags.description: The categories associated with the thread.

CursorParam.name: cursor
CursorParam.description: The cursor to start feeding the activity of the board from.

gore.summary: The feed for the gore board.

cursor.summary: The feed for a board with a cursor.

OwnOnlyParam.name: ownOnly
OwnOnlyParam.description: Whether to only show threads started by the user.

RealmParam.name: realmId
RealmParam.description: The realm id to filter by.

firebase.description: Default bobaserver authentication, powered by firebase.

ensureLoggedIn401.description: User was not found in request that requires authentication.

ensureThreadAccess403.description: User is not authorized to access thread.

lockedThread.summary: User does not have required permissions to access thread.

value.message: User does not have required permissions to access thread.

ensureThreadPermission403.description: User is unauthorized to perform thread operation.

value.message: User does not have required permissions for thread operation.

threadNotFound404.description: The specified thread could not be found.

value.message: The thread with id 29d1b2da-3289-454a-9089-2ed47db4967b was not found.

ensurePermission403.description: User does not have required permissions to complete this action.

ensureBoardAccess403.description: User does not have required permissions to access board.

lockedBoard.summary: User is unauthorized to access board.

value.message: User does not have required permissions to access board.

ensureBoardPermission403.description: User is unauthorized to perform board operation.

value.message: User does not have required permissions for board operation.

boardNotFound404.description: The specified board could not be found.

value.message: The board with id 29d1b2da-3289-454a-9089-2ed47db4967b was not found.

value.tagline: A board to test for logged-in only view

createGoreTestThread.summary: The request body for making a thread on the gore board.

createGoreTestThreadResponse.summary: The response body for making a thread on the gore board.

GoreMetadataUpdateBody.summary: Update metadata for the gore board.

GoreMetadataUpdateResponse.summary: Updated metadata for the gore board.

A board to test collections view.

posts.content: [{"insert":"Remember to be excellent to each other and only be mean to fictional characters!"}]

ff9f2ae2-a254-4069-9791-3ac5e6dff5bb.content: [{"insert":"But can we be mean to you?"}]
[{"insert":"BobaNitro users can be mean to the webmaster once a month."}]
